member.name: ID3D11ModuleInstance.BindConstantBuffer
member.summary: Rebinds a constant buffer from a source slot to a destination slot.
member.param: The source slot number for rebinding.
The destination slot number for rebinding.
The offset in bytes of the destination slot for rebinding. The offset must have 16-byte alignment.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

member.name: ID3D11ModuleInstance.BindConstantBufferByName
member.summary: Rebinds a constant buffer by name to a destination slot.
member.param: The name of the constant buffer for rebinding.
The destination slot number for rebinding.
The offset in bytes of the destination slot for rebinding. The offset must have 16-byte alignment.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

member.name: ID3D11ModuleInstance.BindResource
member.summary: Rebinds a texture or buffer from source slot to destination slot.
member.param: The first source slot number for rebinding.
The first destination slot number for rebinding.
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

member.name: ID3D11ModuleInstance.BindResourceAsUnorderedAccessView
member.summary: Rebinds a resource as an unordered access view (UAV) from source slot to destination slot.
member.param: The first source slot number for rebinding.
The first destination slot number for rebinding.
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

member.name: ID3D11ModuleInstance.BindResourceAsUnorderedAccessViewByName
member.summary: Rebinds a resource by name as an unordered access view (UAV) to destination slots.
member.param: The name of the resource for rebinding.
The first destination slot number for rebinding.
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

member.summary: Rebinds a texture or buffer by name to destination slots.

The first destination slot number for rebinding.
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para:
A module-instance interface is used for resource rebinding.
Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 11 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.
